### Installing packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
## attach libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
install.packages('skimr')
install.packages('kableExtra')
library(skimr)  
library(kableExtra)  
```

###Read lobsterdata
Don't forget to ommit the first couple of rows.
```{r read}
lobsters <- read_xlsx(here("data","lobsters.xlsx"), skip = 4) # skip the first 4 rows
head(lobsters) #see data
skimr::skim(lobsters) #skim using skimr - packagename::function(argument) <- for readability
```
